column1: Ephel is a Sindarin noun which means "encircling fence" or "outer fence".J.R.R. Tolkien and Christopher Tolkien (ed.)
column3: "Appendix: Elements in Quenya and Sindarin Names"
column4: entry pel- It is a combination of et and pel.

column2: "the encircling fence of Brandir";J.R.R. Tolkien and Christopher Tolkien (ed.)
column4: "Index" often simply called the EphelJ.R.R. Tolkien and Christopher Tolkien (ed.)

column2: "Fence of Shadow"; more commonly known as the "Mountains of Shadow"J.R.R. Tolkien
